level.text: Every application for a license to operate a taximeter business shall be accompanied by a non-refundable application fee of five hundred dollars ($500) to be deducted from the first bi-annual license fee of two thousand dollars ($2,000).
The license application fee and the license fee shall be payable by money order or by certified check and payable to the DC Treasurer.
The bi-annual renewal license fee after the first license is one thousand and five hundred dollars ($1,500) and is due on the anniversary of the issuance of the license.
